product_name: Anastasia Beverly HillsBeauty Balm Serum Boosted Skin Tint
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganThis is not a stick foundation! Anastasia Beverly Hills Beauty Balm Serum Boosted Skin Tint, a first-ever BB Cream in stick form, blending skincare and makeup with 8 ingredients for a radiant complexion. This serum boosted skin tint provides sheer to light coverage for a natural, glowing look.
details: DetailsFeaturesHybrid formula fuses skincare & makeupSolid serum packed with 8 skincare ingredientsFeatures HA+ Technology that plumps fine lines & wrinklesSheer to light coverage for an even skin toneDelivers natural-looking skin with a healthy glowWeightless, breathable formula with a second-skin feelSilky texture melts into skin for a seamless, smooth finishQuick & easy application at home or on-the-goEasy-to-blend with fingertipsBrighten, bronze & sculpt with the multi-use shade rangeAvailable in 16 flexible shadesBenefitsNon-irritating, dermatologist tested formulaFree of phthalates, mineral oil, talc, sulfates, paragons, fragranceCruelty freeKey IngredientsHA+ MICROSPHERES - Help to smooth fine-lines and wrinkles.PEPTIDE COMPLEX - Helps to deliver youthful skin.FATTY ACIDS - Help to protect and restore.COLLAGEN-STABILIZER - Helps to moisturize for a smooth effect.COCONUT OIL - Helps to restore for radiant-looking skin.SHEA BUTTER - Helps to add softness and hydration.MARULA OIL - Helps to nourish with powerful antioxidants.JOJOBA SEED OIL - Helps to soothe and moisturize.Item 2621820How To UseDirectly apply to bare skin, starting in the center of the face and blending outwards. Blend using fingertips. Build coverage in desired areas. Pro tip: pick up product directly from stick using fingertips---apply to face for quick touch-ups and application.PRO TIPSAllow skincare to absorb before applying.For a bronzed effect, choose a shade 1-2 shades deeper than your skin tone.For on-the-go touch-ups, pick up product using fingertips, and apply.Use pressing motions with fingertips to build coverage in specific areas as desired.IngredientsCaprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Ethylhexyl Isononanoate, Tribehenin, C20-40 Alcohols, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Corn Starch Modified, Polyester-7, Lauroyl Lysine, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Silica, Polyethylene, Caprylyl Glycol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Lecithin, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Tocopheryl Acetate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Palmitic Acid, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Polygonum Aviculare Extract, Water/Aqua/Eau, Propylene Carbonate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Tocopherol, May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Directly apply to bare skin, starting in the center of the face and blending outwards. Blend using fingertips. Build coverage in desired areas. Pro tip: pick up product directly from stick using fingertips---apply to face for quick touch-ups and application.PRO TIPSAllow skincare to absorb before applying.For a bronzed effect, choose a shade 1-2 shades deeper than your skin tone.For on-the-go touch-ups, pick up product using fingertips, and apply.Use pressing motions with fingertips to build coverage in specific areas as desired.

reviews.headline: Exceeded expectations
reviews.comments: Perfect for the minimalist. Blends flawlessly with concealer. Has surprisingly blurred coverage can barely see my acne scars while providing lightweight coverage. Feels more like a lotion than a foundation.

reviews.headline: Absolutely Amazing
reviews.comments:
The Anastasia Beauty Balm Tinted Moisturizer is absolutely amazing! It gives the perfect balance between skincare and lightweight coverage. The texture is smooth and blends effortlessly into the skin, leaving a natural, radiant finish without feeling heavy. I love how it evens out my complexion while still looking like my skin, just better.

It also feels hydrating throughout the day and doesn't settle into fine lines or look cakey, which is a huge plus. The formula is buildable, so you can go for a sheer glow or layer a little more for extra coverage without losing that fresh, dewy look.

What really stands out is how comfortable it feels—almost like you're not wearing anything at all. It's perfect for everyday use, especially if you're going for that healthy, effortless glow. Definitely a staple in my routine!

reviews.headline: I love this product.
reviews.comments: I'd recommend

reviews.headline: It's perfect
reviews.comments: I like that it's a balm and how it goes on my skin. I have oily skin and it worked well for me

reviews.headline: Gave it to a friend who loved it for its smooth, lightweight
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Shade 16 was darker than my skin tone, so I passed it on to a friend to try. According to them, the Beauty Balm feels lightweight, blends smoothly, and gives great coverage without feeling heavy. They also mentioned it lasts well throughout the day, doesn't cake, and layers nicely with other products. They loved it so much they said they'll definitely buy it again once they finish this tube. The sleek packaging also makes it easy to carry around. Based on their experience, it seems like a high-quality product worth having in the right shade.

reviews.headline: Gave me textured skin when I don't have it
reviews.comments: Don't like it wasted money gave it months to try it diffrent ways always left my skin textured which i don't have textired skin so it was odd it gave me that

reviews.headline: A lovely skin tint
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The anastasia beverly hills beauty balm is my new favorite face product. it has such a creamy and smooth formula that blends with ease and matched my complexion perfectly. Small and compact for convenience on the go and great for a lightweight look in the summer

reviews.headline: A great lightweight skin tint
reviews.comments: I really like this skin tint. It's easier to apply, light coverage and has a nice creamy formula that blends like a dream.

reviews.headline: Really Lightweight
reviews.comments: This really is lightweight and a perfect match. It is so easy to remove at night. I like it for these hot months.

reviews.headline: Honestly amazing
reviews.comments: I have oily skin and sweat badly on my upper lip this is one of the only foundations ive found that i can actually use blotting paper or a napkin to remove excess sweat without messing up my base i love it all around i use it with a brush and think it applies best that way I recommend using a matte setting powder and you have got a great base !!!

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I have now made this a part of my everyday makeup routine quick and effortless. Matches my skin tone perfectly (for reference i'm a brown skinned black girl) and gives me the right amount of "dewy"ness without making my skin look oily. For a girl with combination oily skin that is big.

reviews.headline: Beautiful finish
reviews.comments: I don't have a perfect shade match but it absolutely look so good and natural. Does NOT oxidize/turn orange. Looks good in person and pictures

reviews.headline: Just ok
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The color match when blended is better than expected, but I don't love the texture/finish.  It's very matte when it claims to be glowy, and is a bit grainy.

reviews.headline: Pretty foundation but not acne safe
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I like the packaging on this product a lot, easy for travel and doesn't get messy. The balm also looks very natural on the skin which I like. The only downside for me is it's not acne safe due to the coconut oil in it I believe so I'm hesitant to reach for it every day. If that's not a problem for you though it's a great foundation

reviews.headline: Quite dry
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I really wanted to like the Beauty Balm, but it fell short in several ways. First, the formula was way too dry. For something marketed as a balm, I expected a more hydrating, skin-like finish. It didn't melt into my skin at all. Not a fan

reviews.headline: not my favorite…
reviews.comments: I liked the sheer coverage and convenient packaging of this product. However, the consistency of the product felt very greasy and just kinda sat on top of my skin. If I touched my face at all throughout the day it felt like the product just rubbed off on my hands.

reviews.headline: Creamy and Semi-coverage
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The balm was creamy, which I liked, and in a cute, convenient package for travel. It had a semi full coverage and I prefer a full coverage. No scent. Unfortunately, at the price I probably wouldn't purchase it but it is a decent product.

reviews.headline: Skin tint
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The packaging for me is so beautiful i love it so much when u apply it it feels thick but smooth at the end it leaves a full coverage making it look glossy too

reviews.headline: Great everyday product
reviews.comments: The coverage is very minimal but it is a great everyday product because it is light weight on the skin. The price is a bit high but the packaging is convenient and there is no scent

reviews.headline: I don't know why this is so highly rated
reviews.comments: I tried out this product based on some good tik tok reviews and i honestly do not understand the hype. I have "normal" skin and for me the product sat on top of my skin and would separate while apply my other face products. I also feel like it transferred onto everything i was near. Do not recommend

faceoff_positive.comments: Please go watch my videos because I do explain everything in detail about the product, but I can let you know if you have dry skin, textured skin, pores, and you're looking for a nice smoothing product that gives you a little bit of color this product is going to be amazing for you. I'll be honest initially when I first applied it onto my hand to make sure the color would match. It looked a little bit cakey, and I was very concerned about that but after applying it to my face, it blended out so easily and I have never in my life, had a beauty bomb of this type, although there is not going to be a lot of coverage it does such an amazing job at smoothing out everything on your face that honestly I love this for a no make up day or one of those days where I want extra coverage because it can also be used underneath your foundation. ￼ I used the product two different ways, one being completely on its own and then I also tried it out under a couple of my foundations and those foundations for reference one is a light to medium serum foundation, and the other foundation was a very glow medium coverage foundation and the product performed really well underneath the foundation. It actually helped my foundation look more smooth. What I also really loved about this product is it did not take much at all to smooth out my whole entire face and I wore it for about seven hours and it seemed like my skin looked better as the day went on. This just gives you a beautiful skin like finish with very mild coverage but once again, please try it even if you're not one of those light coverage people because I promise this skin even affect it gives is absolutely amazing. I am a medium skin tone with neutral undertone, leaning more olive and shade 5  is a perfect match for me. You can definitely apply this with your fingers, a beauty, sponge, or a brush. I also would like to mention as a sidenote, initially, I was sent the wrong shade, I was sent shade 12 and although it was way too dark to use for all over, it done a great job as a contour or bronzing shade. I will definitely be recommending this to all of my family and friends and when I run out of this, I will definitely be purchasing it. ￼￼￼￼
faceoff_positive.headline: Great for textured skin Great for textured skin

faceoff_negative.comments:
I love the concept, love the product but here's a few things I noticed. If I prep my skin as I usually would; wash, moisturize, allowing product dry town time etc. The beauty balm does not stay on the skin, becomes patchy, rubs off rather quickly. I would need to constantly reapply while out because just a 20 min target run and it was off. I even tried setting it as they have shown and that made the situation worse, plus defeated the entire purpose of the beauty balm having to set it, in my opinion.
 I am a die hard ABH fan so I'm slightly disappointed in the retail price vs. product quality. Not usually the case with this brand. A few tweaks and this could take over the game! The coverage it gives is light but looks so natural looking and glowy. Minimized everything for me and I loved that, just didn't last. Wish it dried down and didn't stay tacky so it would actually stay in place. 
I applied it the next day without skin prep and it lasted much much longer and blended into the skin much better. If you're a dry skinned girly, this will probably work well for you. This definitely is a product to be used completely on its own. It doesn't layer well with other products, including moisturizers, even with product dry down time included. 
     I purchased shade 2 for the undertone. Love the *red undertone it covers but wish they offered more shades with that undertone vs. the many yellow undertone shades they created. This shade is the only shade that I can purchase that will be a close match for me, but it's too light. Any shade above, is too yellow. No brands focus on red undertones ever and they are missing the mark there. Majority of foundation on the market looks yellow and really doesn't match many, from fair to deep. Forget white cast, now everyone has yellow cast! 
     Last but not least, this product could be problematic for those with acne-prone skin. I do not recommend those individuals to blend with their fingers or apply product directly to face in container to avoid bacterial contamination and breakouts. Reach for a clean brush or make sure your hands are squeaky clean before blending. Much love❤️
faceoff_negative.headline: Great concept, great look, DOESNT last. 😫
